# play()

**Instance Method**

Begins the audio stream from the generator render handler.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func play()
```

## Discussion

When you play the controller, the render handler starts receiving callbacks. The controller ignores calls to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioGeneratorController/play()] when audio is already playing.
title: play()
